languages.text: Поговаривают, что истинной причиной гибели Торбальда Железношкурого было предательство. Столкнувшись с превосходящим врагом, Космические волки призвали на помощь союзников, но находившаяся поблизости эскадра флота Осознания демонстративно ушла, протранслировав лишь: "Кровавый долг архимагосу Амарнату не забыт".

It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."
languages.original_text: Поговаривают, что истинной причиной гибели Торбальда Железношкурого было предательство. Столкнувшись с превосходящим врагом, Космические волки призвали на помощь союзников, но находившаяся поблизости эскадра флота Осознания демонстративно ушла, протранслировав лишь: "Кровавый долг архимагосу Амарнату не забыт".

Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

languages.text: 有传言说，索巴德·铁皮真正的死因是由于背叛。这群太空野狼被强大的敌人包围，向附近的盟友请求援助。然而，真理开拓者舰队的整支中队接到援助请求之后，却立刻撤退了，撤退前还挑衅般地发送了信息——“我们不会忘记阿玛纳特大贤者的血债。”
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

traits.locale_text: 有传言说，索巴德·铁皮真正的死因是由于背叛。这群太空野狼被强大的敌人包围，向附近的盟友请求援助。然而，真理开拓者舰队的整支中队接到援助请求之后，却立刻撤退了，撤退前还挑衅般地发送了信息——“我们不会忘记阿玛纳特大贤者的血债。”

languages.text: トールバルド・アイアンハイドの死の本当の原因は裏切りによるものだという噂があった。強大な敵に出会い、スペースウルフは救援に仲間を呼んだが、近くのコグニサンス艦隊の戦隊は挑発的に「大賢人アマルナトの血債は忘れない！」と放送しながら撤退した。
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

traits.locale_text: トールバルド・アイアンハイドの死の本当の原因は裏切りによるものだという噂があった。強大な敵に出会い、スペースウルフは救援に仲間を呼んだが、近くのコグニサンス艦隊の戦隊は挑発的に「大賢人アマルナトの血債は忘れない！」と放送しながら撤退した。

languages.text: À en croire la rumeur, c'est une trahison qui aurait causé le décès de Thorbald Peau-de-Fer. Confrontés à un ennemi supérieur, les Space Wolves firent appel à leurs alliés, mais un escadron proche de la Flotte de la Connaissance se replia, en envoyant le message suivant avec une attitude de défi : « Nous n'avons pas oublié la dette de sang envers l'archimagos Amarnat ».
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

traits.locale_text: À en croire la rumeur, c'est une trahison qui aurait causé le décès de Thorbald Peau-de-Fer. Confrontés à un ennemi supérieur, les Space Wolves firent appel à leurs alliés, mais un escadron proche de la Flotte de la Connaissance se replia, en envoyant le message suivant avec une attitude de défi : « Nous n'avons pas oublié la dette de sang envers l'archimagos Amarnat ».

languages.text: Se rumorea que el auténtico motivo de la muerte de Thorbald Piel de Hierro fue la traición. Ante un enemigo superior, los Lobos Espaciales convocaron a sus aliados para que acudieran en su ayuda, pero un escuadrón cercano de la Flota Conciencia se retiró, declarando descaradamente que «La deuda de sangre con el Archimagos Amarnat no se olvidará».
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

traits.locale_text: Se rumorea que el auténtico motivo de la muerte de Thorbald Piel de Hierro fue la traición. Ante un enemigo superior, los Lobos Espaciales convocaron a sus aliados para que acudieran en su ayuda, pero un escuadrón cercano de la Flota Conciencia se retiró, declarando descaradamente que «La deuda de sangre con el Archimagos Amarnat no se olvidará».

languages.text: Gerüchten zufolge war Verrat die wahre Ursache von Thorbald Eisenhauts Niedergang. Angesichts eines überlegenen Feindes baten die Space Wolves ihre Verbündeten um Hilfe, aber eine Schwadron der Erkenntnisflotte in der Nähe zog sich zurück und sendete ablehnend: "Die Blutschuld an Erzmagos Amarnat ist nicht vergessen."
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

traits.locale_text: Gerüchten zufolge war Verrat die wahre Ursache von Thorbald Eisenhauts Niedergang. Angesichts eines überlegenen Feindes baten die Space Wolves ihre Verbündeten um Hilfe, aber eine Schwadron der Erkenntnisflotte in der Nähe zog sich zurück und sendete ablehnend: "Die Blutschuld an Erzmagos Amarnat ist nicht vergessen."

languages.text: Thorbald Demirpost'un ölümünün ardında yatan asıl sebebin ihanet olduğu söyleniyordu. Kendilerinden daha güçlü bir düşmanla yüzleşen Uzay Kurtları, müttefiklerinden yardım istemişti. Yakınlardaki Malumat Filosu eskadrası ise "Başmagos Amarnat'ın kan borcunu unutmadık." mesajını gönderip geri çekilmişti.
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the true cause of Thorbald Ironhide's demise was treachery. Faced with a superior enemy, the Space Wolves called on their allies for help, but a nearby squadron of the Cognisance Fleet withdrew, defiantly broadcasting that "The blood debt to Archmagos Amarnat is not forgotten."

traits.locale_text: Thorbald Demirpost'un ölümünün arkasında yatan asıl sebebin ihanet olduğu söyleniyordu. Kendilerinden daha güçlü bir düşmanla yüzleşen Uzay Kurtları, müttefiklerinden yardım istemişti ancak yakınlardaki Malumat Filosu eskadrası, "Başmagos Amarnat'ın kan borcu unutulmadı" mesajını göndererek geri çekilmişti.
